review: I was visiting my in-laws home where my son had fever. He is having a history of febrile convulsions so we alway take care of his high fever. My bother in law recommended this doctor saying that in one or two doses of the doctor, kids get fine. We visited the clinic, we explained that itâ€™s is normal chest congestion due to Delhi pollution and seasonal cough. Doctor provided two syrup - omnacortil forte, amoxycillin oral suspension. After 2 days course, ** *** ****** **** ******** *** ******** He was not eating much and we thought that due to his health. He is very jolly kid so we were more concerned . Then one night my son had a lot of sweat as if someone poured a water on him, next night he started screaming and his diaper leaked after half an hour of sleep. We were clueless, whatâ€™s happening to him. He was very restless and after two hours of consoling and comforting him* ** *** ****** ** **** ********** *** ********* *** ** **** ******* ** ****** ***** *** ********** ** **** ********* ** *** *** **** ******* ** ***** ********* *** **** *** ** ****** ********* **** ***** *** ****** ***** *** ***** ** ****** *** ** *** ******** *** ****** ******** *** ****** ******** *** ***** ********.

review: Dr was not in correct state of mind while attending us. He was fighting with reception on phone to not take more patient. In all this he hardly saw our kid with full attention and thus missed a important blister to note which kid was suffering with in mouth. Overall I paid 800 just to listen his fight and candy for my kid. Thank you Dr. I hope you find peace

From birth of my child to 6 yrs we have been referring to Dr adlakha . We can discuss with him freely and he listens to parents carefully.

Highly recommended.
